p: A mixture of natural resin acids from Scotch pine ( Pinus sylvestris) and Norway spruce ( Picea abies) was obtained from Hankkija Oy (Hyvinkää, Finland) and produced by Forchem (Rauma, Finland). This pure resin acids product is a derivative of the commercial product Progres® from Hankkija Oy (patent no FI124918) which was used in previously published broiler studies and contains about 90% free fatty acids and 8%–9% resin acids [ 35– 37]. The resin acids mixture used in this study represents the pure resin acid fraction which contains mainly abietic acid and dehydroabietic acid (Table 1).
